sorcer.core.provider

Class ControlFlowManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.core.provider.ControlFlowManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MonitoringControlFlowManager

    public class ControlFlowManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The ControlFlowManager class is responsible for handling control flow mograms (Conditional, NetJob, NetTask). This class is used by the ServiceShell class for executing Exertions.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Concatenator concatenator
      Reference to a concatenator proxy if available.

      protected Jobber jobber
      Reference to a jobber proxy if available.
      protected static org.slf4j.Logger logger
      Logger for this ExerterController logging.

      Reference to a spacer service.

               throws ExertionException

      • doRendezvousExertion

        public Mogram doRendezvousExertion(ServiceExertion xrt)
                            throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                   MogramException
        Selects a Jobber or Spacer for exertion processing. If own Jobber or Spacer is not available then fetches one and forwards the exertion for processing.
        Parameters:
        xrt - the exertion to be processed
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        ExertionException
        MogramException
